attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop people from other countrys bleeding our NHS system dry, Only British citizen people in the UK, should get free medical care and stop people bleeding the sytem dry. This way we can pay the nurses and doctors a better wage and stop the fatcats talking all the money. Also make all drugs free to every British citizen who has paid into the system who needs them and stop people miss using our system.
